data.md:MetaData: Linescanner images of sediment core PS75/219-2

2 core sections: A 0-0.43, B 0-0.42 m, 2 frozen surface samples (bulk,14C), 2 subcores (GC liners, A: 0-43 cmbsf, frozen, B: 0-42 cmbsf), 3 subcores (MUC liners, 1 frozen 0-35 cmbsf, archive, 1 frozen 0-35 cmbsf, forams, 1 cut into 1 cm slices 0-34 cmbsf, frozen), 1 surface sample for living benthic foraminifera (stained), sieved coarse fraction of residual sediment (MBL-35), Brown mud on top, grey diamicton below, Subcore A (GC liner) cut at wrong depth and fixed with tape (no sediment loss)
Thumbnail gallery of linescanner images from sediment core PS75/219-2
